document.full_text: for jessica ray of denver, a university's proximity to rock-climbing and good friends, as well as tuition that is half as much as competitors, aces a decision.
document.title: price of 'safety' school adds to allure
lines_and_colors: for jessica ray of denver, a university's proximity to rock-climbing and good friends, as well as tuition that is half as much as competitors, aces a decision.
